summary: Add a public no-login message submission section that persists the latest message and displays only the newest one, implemented as a new page below the existing "message page".
architectural_notes: Store only the latest submitted message in a backend/persistent store so it remains visible after refresh; new submissions overwrite the previous message.
No authentication/sign-in required for message submission or viewing.

existing_features.title: Frontend: Add a new UI section/page below the existing "Message" (closing) section that (a) displays the current latest stored message and (b) provides a text input + submit control for anyone to post a new message without login; after submission, the UI must update to show only the newest message.

Frontend/Backend integration: Update the typed frontend backend interface bindings (candid/declarations) so the new public message methods are callable from the React app using the existing actor creation flow (including anonymous actor usage).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a no-login message submission + display page that persists and shows only the latest message (new page below the existing "message page").

Backend: Store a single "latest public message" value that persists across canister upgrades and page refreshes, and expose public (no-auth) methods to (1) fetch the latest message and (2) submit a new message that overwrites the previous one.

projectName: Add public no-login latest-message submission section (persist newest message only)
